test.name: 01b DNF Some Units of Measure exist

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select count(*) from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active where id in (select sourceid from rf2_cr_transitiveclosuretable where destinationId = 30428011000036107 or sourceid = 30428011000036107);

test.name: 02 All Unit of Measure concepts are 900000000000074008|primitive (Except Composite Unit of Measure (700000041000036105))

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active WHERE isKindOf_cr(id, 30428011000036107) AND definitionstatusid != 900000000000074008 AND NOT isKindOf_cr(id, 700000041000036105);

test.name: 03 All Unit of Measure FSNs have a semantic tag (AU qualifier)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active WHERE isActiveConcept_cr(conceptId) AND isKindOf_cr(conceptid, 30428011000036107) AND typeid = 900000000000003001 AND term NOT REGEXP BINARY ' \\(AU qualifier\\)$';

test.name: 04 Concept 30428011000036107|unit of measure has FSN = 'unit of measure (AU qualifier)'

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active WHERE typeId = 900000000000003001 AND conceptId = 30428011000036107 AND term != BINARY 'unit of measure (AU qualifier)';

test.name: 05 Concept 30428011000036107|unit of measure has SYN = 'unit of measure'

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active WHERE typeId = 900000000000013009 AND conceptId = 30428011000036107 AND term != BINARY 'unit of measure';

test.name: 06b DNF unit of measure(30428011000036107) is a child of 30515011000036103|Australian qualifier

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE sourceId = 30428011000036107 AND typeId = 116680003 AND destinationId = 30515011000036103 and id != 4575781000168121;

test.name: 07b DNF unit of measure(30428011000036107) is only a child of 30515011000036103|Australian qualifier

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE sourceId = 30428011000036107 AND typeId = 116680003 AND destinationId != 30515011000036103;

test.name: 08b DNF Unit of Measure concepts (excluding composite units of measure) only have [116680003|Is a] relationships

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE isKindOf_cr(sourceid, 30428011000036107) AND NOT isKindOf_cr(sourceid, 700000041000036105) AND typeid != 116680003;

test.name: 09b DNF Unit of Measure descendents only have destinationIds that are types of 30428011000036107|Unit of Measure

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE isDescendentOf_cr(sourceid, 30428011000036107) AND NOT isKindOf_cr(destinationid, 30428011000036107);

test.name: 10b DNF All Unit of Measure relationships are ungrouped (group = 0)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active WHERE isKindOf_cr(sourceid, 30428011000036107) AND relationshipgroup != 0;
